content: I recently had a urinary tract infection and was prescribed antibiotics, so I'm wondering if that could be contributing to my fatigue and joint pain. I've also been dealing with some nagging sinus issues, which is why I saw Dr. Patel, the ENT specialist, who diagnosed me with chronic sinusitis. Could the UTI or the antibiotics be causing my fatigue and joint pain, or is it more likely related to the chronic sinusitis?
